targets.query: SELECT mean("pendingTasks") FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(previous)
SELECT distinct("version_configstring") FROM "puppetagent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY workerType
SELECT count(distinct(host)) FROM (SELECT "cpu_usage","host" FROM "autogen"."procstat" WHERE $timeFilter) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY workerType, time($__interval * 10) fill(null)
SELECT max("cpu_usage") FROM "autogen"."procstat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY workerType, time($__interval*20)

SELECT count(distinct(host)) FROM (SELECT "cpu_usage","host" FROM "autogen"."procstat" WHERE $timeFilter) WHERE $timeFilter  AND ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) GROUP BY workerType, time($__interval * 10) fill(null)
SELECT sum("events_failure") FROM "puppetagent" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(null)
SELECT max("cpu_usage") FROM "autogen"."procstat" WHERE $timeFilter  AND ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) GROUP BY workerType, time($__interval*20)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WITH key = "workerType" WHERE "provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware'
